data.name: Winter Resort Simulator 2 - Riedstein
data.detailed_description:
Finally, there is exciting news for fans of WRS again! Just in time for the start of the winter season, a DLC will be released with a new game world, frequently requested features and no less than three new ropeways. The highlight is the completely new 8-seater gondola lift from Doppelmayr with a long-awaited middle station, which brings plenty of new technical gaming fun for single and multiplayer. Speaking of multiplayer, the DLC also introduces a skiing mode for multiplayer with 3rd-person perspeccive, which can be enjoyed on the fun slope on the new map. In addition to the DLC, a major update to the main WRS2 game will also be released, which will be available for free to all WRS2 customers. So stay tuned, there's something exciting for everyone!

Features in the DLC:

  • Completely new game world in alpine style
  • Detailed design with fun slope and kids land
  • 3rd person skier mode for singleplayer and multiplayer
  • New Doppelmayr 8-passenger gondola lift type Uni G with a mid station
  • Highlight: Freely selectable bend angle in the mid station as well as dynamic adjustment of the building!
  • Additionally a nostalgic, fixed-grip 3-seater chairlift
  • All DLC functions can also be used in mods - so there are great new modding possibilities!
  • Developed in collaboration with modders from the community

data.short_description: Just in time for the start of the winter season, a DLC will be released with a new game world, frequently requested features and no less than three new ropeways.
data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core with 3,0 GHz and Hyper Threading
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM, Shader Model 5.1
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Shader Model 5.1
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core with 3,5 GHz recommended
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
